ProductInfo.Features:
Use this DVR at home, stores, and any other place you are worried about.
This Complete DVR Surveillance System features 2x indoor cameras and 2x outdoor cameras.
The Complete DVR Surveillance System comes with a full featured remote control.
This product offers you the convenience and versatility you need from a true security system.
The indoor cameras are compact and portable enough to be installed in any crevice of the room.
ProductInfo.Name: Extremely Versatile Complete DVR Surveillance System with 2x Indoor + 2x Outdoor Cameras (H.264) Security Tracer system New
